original_title: Body and Soul: The State of the Jewish Nation
overview: Through incisive conversations with key experts in history, archaeology, international law, political science and media, Body and Soul â€“ The State of the Jewish Nation not only shows the undeniable historical connection between the Jewish People and the Land of Israel, but also succeeds in debunking the propaganda, myths and misinformation that have become deeply entrenched in public discourse.
title: Body and Soul: The State of the Jewish Nation
